channel.title: Shop item loop?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Shop item loop?"

item.title: Re: Shop item loop?
item.content:encoded: Counterfeit Permits don't loop, so as the Bingo-related items.

item.title: Re: Shop item loop?
item.content:encoded: at the time, they didnt. now they do.

item.title: Re: Shop item loop?
item.content:encoded: To tell u the truth i think they all loop, if u don't take my word on this then search the word 'item' in the search bar.

item.title: Re: Shop item loop?
item.content:encoded: Alternatively, you can buy duplicates of everything before you loop and toss them in the storehouse, and then take them out right after you loop and wear them. But, it is correct, none of those items loop.

item.title: Re: Shop item loop?
item.content:encoded:
My understanding is that anything you can buy with ryo is not looping.

Sell it and buy new stuff after loop.

item.title: Re: Shop item loop?
item.content:encoded: I'm not sure but I don't think any of these items loop!

item.title: Shop item loop?
item.content:encoded:
Do any of these permanent items bought from the shop loop?

  • Knapsack (Permanent Item): 12000 Ryo
  • Ninja Dog (Permanent Item): 8000 Ryo
  • Bingo Armor (Permanent Item): 28000 Ryo
  • Perimeter Barrier (Permanent Item): 20000 Ryo
  • Ninja Puppet (Permanent Item): 12000 Ryo
  • Chakra Armor (Permanent Item): 20000 Ryo
  • Desert Robes (Permanent Item): 20000 Ryo
  • Dog Collar (Permanent Item): 20000 Ryo
  • Trench Knife (Permanent Item): 4000 Ryo
  • Giant Fan (Permanent Item): 12000 Ryo
